pages.title: So what are there?
pages.text: This mod is planning to add all of the Holomems' (Yes, JP, EN and ID) as mobs/npcs and features based on them$(o) (So if you haven't seen your oshi here it's working in progress - future updates will add them in one by one~)$().$(br2)$(o)p.s. I'm a solo developer so things might take time *wink.
One of the bigger features of $(#34c9fe)HoloContinuum$().
